page.title: 03Lord and Lady Neidpath
page.content: {Lord and Lady Neidpath}live at{Stanway {House.}Lord Neidpath is the son of David Charteris, 12th Earl of Wemyss and March. He is 37 and was educated at Eton. Catherine Neidpath is 33. She is the daughter of Jonathan Guinness and was educated at Cobham. They have been married for 2 years. Their baby is 9 months old and is called Francis Richard Charteris, but they call him Dick. He will probably go to Didbrook School when he is 4. They own 2 Arab horses and a yellow labrador called Smelley. They prefer to live in the country but a sixth of the time they spend in London or Scotland. Their hobbies are gardening, skiing, and history. In her spare time Lady Neidpath supervises the house, looks after Dick, searches for historical books, and gardens.
